/>
XIII.i.3.G.2.a
.
Jurisdiction for Rating Determinations Under 38 U.S.C. 109(c)
The VSC of the Wilmington VAMROC has sole jurisdiction for all rating determinations required for the Polish and Czechoslovakian Armed Forces under
38 U.S.C. 109(c)
per
38 CFR 3.359
.
Route requests received by any other RO to the Wilmington VAMROC with information as to the referral provided to the submitting health care facility.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G - Eligibility for Medical Services for Polish and Czechoslovakian Armed Forces
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G
